price: ‘আৰু পৰৱৰ্তীসকলৰ মাজত মোৰ সুনাম-সুখ্যাতি অব্যাহত ৰাখা,
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
